column4: when it goes black can you press Ctrl+Alt+F1 and get a console?
are screensaver and power settings set to never dim etc?
right now i have caffeine installed so my screen never goes to idle
i know some server switches for xorg.conf. Kde still has sweet power/screensaver disabling ability
i see. I always turn that stuff off
i suggest you check. It may be a known issue for your make/model (assuming the system has one)
i could try, but this is more something they should fix and send out
what about suse, mandriva, fedora, xpud, puppy and so on?
natty is still very supported, as is maverick.
and without actually looking, you wouldn't know either
its not about me knowing hehe
both are equally developed and supported
but 11.10 should have most of the focus hehe
